Posts.Content: Hi catharin, like you i was on arimidex, and it went straight to my bones, I have now been on aromasin for three months and yes the wind is terrible but i have also noticed that i have a lot of trapped wind, how did you feel when they took you off the arimidex, i was a bit worried that the aromasin wouldnt work as well. This is my second time i was first diagnosed in dec 2000 then again feb 2004, after the fist i was given radiation and then tamoxifen, this time i was on fec chemo then radiation.
Posts.Title: Aromasin
